name: my-resume-react-monorepo
description: Monorepo para My Resume React - Portafolio personal con frontend Next.js y backend RAG

scripts.build:backend: cd backend && echo 'Backend build handled by Docker'
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/node_modules frontend/.next frontend/out backend/venv backend/__pycache__ backend/*.pyc
scripts.docker:build: docker build -t my-resume-react ./frontend && docker build -t my-resume-backend ./backend
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && echo 'Deploy to your preferred platform'
scripts.deploy:backend: cd backend && echo 'Deploy to Google Cloud Run or your preferred platform'
scripts.docs: echo '📚 Documentación disponible en:' && echo '  - README.md (este archivo)' && echo '  - frontend/README.md' && echo '  - backend/README.md' && echo '  - docs/chatbot-requeriments.md'
